name: Highway Car Crash Racing
description:
Those who love performing high level car stunts, fast driving, dangerous turns and multiple hurdles. Highway Car Crash Racing with an extra dose of amazing multiple vehicles driving and truck stunt. Go against hurdles, car crashing, high jumps and speed racing. Always try to crash rival cars from side & rear. A reckless face-to-face crashes and avoid to stop your engine if extreme damage caused. There are many twist and turns on all tracks so be careful with your drive. It’s an ultimate survival test against all opponents with your demolition derby xtreme car driving skills.

Features:
- It's Free and can be played offline
- Real crash car simulation using the next gen physics
- Real accident simulator game to smash
- Deadly whirlpool smash field
- Thrash the damage car into metal pieces
- Challenging obstacle course for stuntman racers
- Extreme crash derby game ever to be on the rampage
- Extreme speed stunts for racing car stunts
